issue.title: [Rust] Implement min/max for primitive arrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2519](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2519). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I would like to efficient get the min or max value in an array of primitives for efficient aggregate queries.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2519?focusedCommentId=16585366) by Chao Sun (csun):*
`[~andygrove]`: should this already be resolved?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2519?focusedCommentId=16586817) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
This was implemented a long time ago so I am closing this JIRA.,
